title: DND service consumes extra CPU cores causing higher utilization on worker node
content:
While using the solution in Medium deployment size, under high load, the DND service consumes two additional CPU cores, and that results in higher CPU utilization on the worker node.

Cause

This issue occurs because of the high throughput on the system requiring more CPU resources in DND service pod.

Solution

Add two extraÂ CPU cores to the worker node in which DND is running.
